Nachdem Sie die Konfiguration vorgenomme.en-us: Once you have made the configuration, you can use the translation functions in your Markdown files.

Ersetzen Sie <code>DEEPL-API-KEY</code>.en-us: Replace DEEPL-API-KEY with your own api key.

Nachdem Sie den Api-Key erstellt haben,.en-us: After you have created the api key, create a file called auth_key.json in the root directory of your project and add the following content:

Das Plugin ist noch in der Entwicklung u.en-us: The plugin is still under development and it is recommended to read the documentation to understand the functionalities and limitations. I also ask you to report all requirements and change proposals in the Github issues.

<strong>Aber es ist nicht ausgeschlossen.en-us: But it is not impossible that other plugins will also work.

Diese gro\u00dfartigen Plugins ben\u00f6.en-us: These great plugins definitely need full support and recognition.

Diese Auflistung sind die Plugins die be.en-us: This list contains the plugins that were used directly in the development of Langly.

Das Langly-Plugin f\u00fcr MkDocs ist ei.en-us: The Langly plugin for MkDocs is a plugin that provides language support and translations for websites created with MkDocs using the Material theme. It allows easy management of multilingual content and automatic translation of texts to reach a wider audience. It deliberately does not comply with any of the current translation standards but takes a completely unique but open approach.

Diese Plugin wurde f\u00fcr Verwendung d.en-us: This plugin was created to use the great Material theme and offers functionalities to e.g. internationalize the blog area.

<strong>Bitte lesen sie diesen Abschnitt.en-us: Please read this section carefully and be sure to exclude the Api key in the .gitignore and also protect it in every possible way from being uploaded to the Internet.

Um das Plugin zu verwenden, ben\u00f6tig.en-us: To use the plugin, you need a Deepl API key. You can obtain this free of charge from the Deepl website.

<strong>\u00d6ffnen Sie die Datei .gitig.en-us: Open the .gitignore file and add the line auth_key.json to prevent the file from being uploaded by mistake.

Nach der Installation k\u00f6nnen Sie da.en-us: After installation, you can activate the plugin in your mkdocs.yml.

In dieser Konfiguration wird die Sprache.en-us: In this configuration, German is set as the source language and English as the target language. You can add as many target languages as you like. However, this affects the `serve' performance all the more

<strong>Es werden im vorliegenden Entwic.en-us: No other themes are supported in the current state of development. The only translation engine currently available is Deepl and a deepl api key is required to use the plugin.

Das Plugin analysiert markdown Texte und.en-us: The plugin analyzes markdown texts and evaluates masked text passages that are enclosed with [[ and ]]. These delimiter are removed when the page is rendered and the source and target language are displayed correctly on your page.

Gehen sie wie folgt vor um Texte zu mask.en-us: Proceed as follows to mask texts

Satz in dem der Delimiter vorkommt.en-us: Record in which the delimiter occurs

Ich freue mich \u00fcber jede Art von Fe.en-us: I am happy to receive any kind of feedback and support.

Vielen Dank f\u00fcr Ihr Interesse an di.en-us: Thank you for your interest in this plugin!

<code>[[</code>Dieser Absatz enth\u00e4l.en-us: [[This paragraph contains several sentences in your source language. It is the recommended way of masking text passages and provides Deepl with more context to deliver a better translation.]

Der Text innerhalb der Maskierung wird d.en-us: The text within the masking is then automatically translated by Langly.

Umschlie\u00dfen sie den \u00f6ffnenden.en-us: Enclose the opening and closing delimiter with `

Ein deepl-Account wird ben\u00f6tigt (de.en-us: A deepl account is required (deepl is currently the only supported translation engine)

F\u00fcr den Anfang werden ein paar vorl.en-us: To get started, a few preliminary steps are required to use the plugin.
